statements: DELETE FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_id = 1 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.100';
DELETE FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_name = 'Server1' AND is_verified = TRUE;
DELETE FROM network_participation WHERE node_id = 1 AND participation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = false;
DELETE FROM node_history WHERE verification_result = FALSE;
DELETE FROM node_history WHERE verification_reason LIKE '%rejected%';
DELETE FROM node_logs WHERE log_type = 'Error' AND node_id = 5;
